name: TAU
description:
TAU is a rhythm game where you control a paddle upon a circle attempting to keep the beats from escaping your grasp. Developed with LÖVE.

Documentation on making a level and other peoples' custom levels are available on the public development Discord. Come join us! https://discord.gg/UZtSsQf

Development is put on pause until further notice, as of 1/12/2020.

CREDITS

  • pizzazip - Creator, Developer
  • DeadlySprinklez - Co-Developer
  • everyone on the Discord server for memeing with us (love you guys)

CONTROLS (keyboard | controller - what they do)

  • Z, X, Left Click, and Right Click | A and X  - hit the beat
  • To hit the big square beats, you have to hit two buttons simultaneously!
  • Mouse | Left Joystick - move the paddle
  • S | B - stop level (hold to go back to menu), hold to save and quit (settings only)
  • A | Y - restart/play level, reload level list (menu only)
  • Arrow Keys | D-Pad - navigate (menu only)
  • Enter | Start - enter level (menu only)
  • Q | X - enter last level opened (menu only)
  • Tab | Select/Back - enter settings (menu only)

PLANS FOR THE FUTURE (a.k.a. the to-do list)

Improve level select menuSkip intro animaticBindable keysEnd-of-level resultsCat mode???Background and foreground imagesA full level editorBomb beats/MinesRoll beats

We are offering this prototype for free, however any donations are highly appreciated and will be split evenly between the two developers. Thank you for supporting us and Tau. Enjoy.
